Sentencas: An improved one-dimensional dynamic model of a tubular SOFC stack capable of system simulation in the virtual test bed (VTB) simulation environment is presented in this paper.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: This model is based on the electrochemical and thermal modeling, accounting for the voltage losses and temperature dynamics.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: The modeling of an external reformer is also included in this study.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: A detailed parametric analysis of working conditions and cell configuration of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack is the main focus of this paper.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: The following operating parameters are investigated: pressure ratio, temperature, mass flow rate, external reforming degree and stream to carbon (S/C) ratio.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: The cell geometric parameters studied include cell diameter and cell length.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: Elevated operating pressure improves the cell performance.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: Whereas, higher operating temperature decreases both the Nernst potential and the irreversible losses, resulting in an initial increase then a decrease in cell efficiency.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: It was found that a higher S/C ratio yields a lower Hz concentration and partial pressure, which has a negative effect on the Nernst potential.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: Increased cell diameter is found to increase the power due to a larger activation area at the same time and due to longer current path length there is an increase in the ohmic loss.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model

Sentencas: Increased length of the cell has the undesired affect of an increased pressure drop.
Titulo: Parameter setting and analysis of a dynamic tubular SOFC model
